description:
You’ll love my place because of the location right by beautiful east river. My place is conveniently located close to central park, trains (4,5,6) and stores. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Hello! i have a fully furnished home. two full bunk beds in the rooms and a sofa bed in the living room.
name: 2 Bedroom Apt Perfect For Groups
review: Muy cómodo, el super a 3 cuadras, el camión pasa en la esquina para llevarte al Subway
